question: The 172nd Defence Pensioners Adalat was being organized in which Indian state?
explanation: Rajnath Singh inaugurated the 172nd Defence Pensioners Adalat in Uttar Pradesh capital Lucknow, becoming the first Raksha Mantri to be a part of the event. The two-day Defence Pensioners Adalat aims at redressal of related pension grievances of veterans of Armed Forces and their Next of Kin residing in all districts of Uttar Pradesh. The complex process involving many agencies and the Defence Accounts Department is working tirelessly to provide pensions in a time-bound manner.
